text: The mansion The U.S. Virgin Islands Governor's Mansion (known as Government House) is the official residence of the Governor of the United States Virgin Islands, located in Christiansted. ==Other mansions== The following places are also known as the Governor's Mansion: *A residence in Saint John that was designed by Puerto Rican architect Francisco Valinés Cofresí (1878-1949). *Katherineberg, in Charlotte Amalie, St. Thomas ==See also== *National Register of Historic Places listings in the United States Virgin Islands *Government House, British Virgin Islands, residence of the Governor of the British Virgin Islands ==References== ==External links== *USVI Governor's Mansion Tour- Paradise Jam, YouTube video Category:Historic houses Category:Government buildings in the United States Virgin Islands
title: U.S. Virgin Islands Governor's Mansion
